abilities.name: Mortar
about: Fires projectile that does damage on impact and when the projectile explodes

abilities.name: Reflective Mortar
about: Player is affected with a debuff that whenever encounter fires a mortar projectile, a new (unfriendly) projectile also fires mortar projectile that does damage on impact and when the projectile explodes

about: Smashes the ground creating fissures in line
